tool_description:
Unlock the world of literature with the Goodreads Scraper API – your gateway to a treasure trove of books, authors and quotes from goodreads.com

Your feedback is crucial in helping us improve and tailor the API to meet your needs better. Please take a moment to share your thoughts and suggestions; we greatly appreciate your input!
name: Goodreads Scraper
title: Goodreads Scraper

api_list.name: Parse url
api_list.description: Retrieve page details from a goodreads url and transform the web content into structured json data

api_list.name: Get book quotes
api_list.description: Retrieve a paginated list of quotes by a book quote list id. Note that the book quotes list id is different from the book id.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: Book quotes list id. Note that this id is different from book id.

api_list.name: Get tag quotes
api_list.description: Retrieve a paginated list of quotes by a tag.

api_list.name: Get author quotes
api_list.description: Retrieve a paginated list of quotes by author id.

api_list.name: Get author books
api_list.description: Retrieve a paginated list of books authored by a specific author using author id.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Sort book list by one of the options, default: popularity

api_list.name: Get author by id
api_list.description: Retrieve author details by author id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://goodreads-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/author/1244"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "goodreads-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://goodreads-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/author/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "goodreads-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get book by id
api_list.description: Retrieve  book details by book id
